hero.title: Full-Stack Engineer Jin Hwan
hero.description: Full-stack engineer connecting web, on-device LLM, real-time streaming, and robotics into shippable products.
hero.summary: Full-stack engineer connecting web, on-device LLM, real-time streaming, and robotics into shippable products. I specialize in bridging mobile on-device AI with real-time media/robotics through streaming and low-latency control, achieving both user experience and performance with privacy-centric architecture and PWA/edge deployment. I have experience launching and operating multiple projects with end-to-end ownership from product initialization to deployment/operation automation.

sections.projectsDescription: I've explored new technologies and realized ideas through various side projects.
sections.publicationsDescription: Books containing insights on technology and development.
sections.hackathonsDescription: Awards from various competitions and certifications I hold.

data.summary: Aspiring full-stack engineer with extensive development experience, capable of quickly learning and flexibly adapting to new environments.
data.description:
• Full-stack engineer with hands-on experience in web, app, AI Agent, and other projects.
• Actively utilize Claude Code.
• Extensive use of various tech stacks including Django, FastAPI, and Flutter, centered on Node.js (Nest.js) backend development.
• Experience in infrastructure construction and operation through Docker containerization and various cloud providers such as AWS, GCP, Cloudflare, and NCP.
• Experience in stable service operation through load testing and test code.
• Through the above experiences, I have the ability to quickly digest new technologies and environments.

work.title: AI-based UX writing automation platform for major financial institutions including NH, Samsung, and Hanwha.
work.description: Responsible for full-stack development and maintenance of company products. Developed and maintained client web applications, admin dashboard, and API service admin dashboard. Maintained Figma Plugin. Implemented and maintained CI/CD for entire product suite. Refactored operating environment to improve visibility and maintainability by organizing unnecessary code, repositories, and AWS cloud resources. Reduced API response time (from minutes → within 8 seconds). Optimized AI model serving server (24 seconds → 4 seconds). Analyzed pptx-automizer library and added multi-element modification logic. Refactored AI model serving server based on layered architecture. Optimized Docker Compose + ECR environment.

projects.title: Full-stack development and maintenance of all company products
projects.description:
- Client web application development and maintenance
- Admin dashboard development and maintenance
- Translation API provision to external partners and maintenance
- Figma Plugin maintenance
- New CI/CD implementation and maintenance for entire product suite

projects.title: Refactored operating environment to improve maintainability
projects.description: Improved visibility and maintainability of the operating environment by organizing unnecessary code, repositories, AWS cloud resources, and internal documentation.

projects.title: Reduced API response time
projects.description:
- Reduced response time of translation API from 3 minutes to within 8 seconds by identifying and removing unnecessary logic
- AI model serving server (FastAPI) optimization through instance type cost/performance comparison + INT8 quantization experiments: 24s → 4s
- Found that morphological analyzer (mecab) was using cold start → changed to hot start approach
- Changed text embedding from parallel processing → batch processing after checking server specs, reducing time by ~3 seconds

projects.title: Newly developed PPT file text rewriting feature
projects.description:
- Analyzed ECMA-376 Office Open XML file formats documentation
- Analyzed internal structure of pptx-automizer library
- Confirmed that duplicate elementId (name element of <p:cNvPr> tag) cannot be modified in the library
- Added logic to enable multi-element modifications

projects.title: Implemented AI model serving server
projects.description:
- Improved maintainability by analyzing structural issues and refactoring code structure based on modularization and layered architecture to address increasing complexity due to feature expansion in single API-based service
- Improved operational efficiency by optimizing Docker Compose + ECR environment to minimize image build and deployment time.

work.title: Tax accounting SaaS 'WATT' provider
work.description: Tax accounting SaaS backend development. Responsible for Nest.js backend development. Implemented and modularized business logic reflecting various calculation rules (deduction items, ratio calculations, amount range conditions, etc.).

projects.title: Tax accounting SaaS backend development
projects.description: Implemented and modularized business logic reflecting various calculation rules (deduction items, ratio calculations, amount range conditions, etc.).

work.title: On-site fitting room reservation service (outsourced development)
work.description: Clothing fitting reservation app development and maintenance. Developed backend server with Python/Django, handled REST API with DRF, implemented login and reservation-related CRUD. Improved customer convenience with SmartStore crawling. Developed cross-platform app with Flutter, managed state with Provider package, applied MVVM design pattern. Developed admin page with Next.js.

projects.title: Backend Server Development
projects.description: Developed backend server with Python/Django, handled REST API with DRF, implemented login and reservation-related CRUD. Improved customer convenience with SmartStore crawling.

projects.title: Flutter App Development
projects.description: Developed cross-platform app with Flutter, managed state with Provider package, applied MVVM design pattern.

work.title: Shopping platform providing online design ordering and printing services for business cards, stickers, flyers, photo cards, and other printed materials
work.description: Migrated from Express to NestJS to improve standardized development environment and maintainability. Applied hexagonal architecture. Integrated Next.js/NestJS services into Turborepo + pnpm-based monorepo to establish common module reuse system and eliminate duplicate code. Checked service stability through load testing with ngrinder. Managed AWS infrastructure (EC2 monitoring, new site domain setup).

projects.title: NestJS Migration
projects.description: Migrated from Express to NestJS to improve standardized development environment and maintainability. Applied hexagonal architecture.

projects.title: Monorepo Setup
projects.description: Integrated Next.js frontend and NestJS backend repositories, which were previously separated into multiple repos, into a Turborepo + pnpm-based monorepo to establish a common module reuse system, eliminate duplicate code, and improve overall development productivity.

projects.title: Load Testing and Performance Verification
projects.description: Checked service stability through load testing with ngrinder.

projects.title: AWS Infrastructure Management
projects.description: Managed AWS infrastructure including EC2 monitoring and new site domain setup.
